<h3>翻譯小測試</h3>
Q1. Apple= ? <br>
<input type="radio" name="q1" id="ans1">梨子
<input type="radio" name="q1" id="ans2">蘋果
<input type="radio" name="q1" id="ans3">榴蓮
<button onclick="question1()">Submit</button>
<p id="results1">Oppps! 錯了～</p>

Q2. Apple= ? <br>
<input type="radio" name="q2" id="ans4">梨子
<input type="radio" name="q2" id="ans5">蘋果
<input type="radio" name="q2" id="ans6">榴蓮
<button onclick="question2()">Submit</button>
<p id="results2">Correct!好叻 <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," width="20%"></p>

Q2. 誰是SM公司首位回中國開設獨立工作室的中國藝人= ? <br>
<input type="radio" name="q3" id="ans7">張藝興
<input type="radio" name="q3" id="ans8">劉憲華
<input type="radio" name="q3" id="ans9">肖俊
<button onclick="question3()">Submit</button>
<p id="results3">Oppps! 錯了～</p>

               
            
                <script>function question1(){
    var ans1 = document.getElementById("ans1");
    var ans2 = document.getElementById("ans2");
    var ans3 = document.getElementById("ans3");

    if(ans2.checked){
         document.getElementById("results1").innerHTML = "Correct!好叻 <img src='data:image/jpeg;base64,' width='20%'>";
    }else if(ans1.checked || ans3.checked){
 document.getElementById("results1").innerText="Oppps! 錯了～";
    }
}
function question2(){
    var ans4 = document.getElementById("ans4");
    var ans5 = document.getElementById("ans5");
    var ans6 = document.getElementById("ans6");

    if(ans4.checked){
         document.getElementById("results2").innerHTML = "Correct!好叻 <img src='data:image/jpeg;base64,' width='20%'>";
    }else if(ans4.checked || ans6.checked){
 document.getElementById("results2").innerText="Oppps! 錯了～";
    }
}

function question3(){
    var ans7 = document.getElementById("ans7");
    var ans8 = document.getElementById("ans8");
    var ans9 = document.getElementById("ans9");

    if(ans7.checked){
         document.getElementById("results3").innerHTML = "Correct!好叻 <img src='data:image/jpeg;base64,' width='20%'>";
    }else if(ans8.checked || ans9.checked){
 document.getElementById("results3").innerText="Oppps! 錯了～";
    }
}</script>
